TEXT: The dream-form of a faraway sleeper. NL Alters their enemies' minds, and their own.
NL With all your might, you will the heart out of existence with a powerful psionic strike.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~absent~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
